function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Highly turbulent wake with a Reynolds number of about 10^5 in spaces with high people density and movement.","Impact":"Increased dispersion of aerosols carrying contagious diseases, leading to higher risk of exposure.","Mitigation":"Implementing ventilation systems to quickly remove aerosols from the space, reducing the risk of exposure.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, filtration systems, and HVAC systems with high air exchange rates.","People":"People in crowded indoor spaces such as corridors, supermarket aisles, meeting rooms, and school classrooms.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"A cloud of infected aerosol may be mixed by the wakes of many people in spaces like supermarkets, increasing the risk of exposure to subsequent individuals.","Impact":"Elevated risk of infection from viruses present in the mixed aerosol, especially for subsequent individuals passing through the same space.","Mitigation":"Implementing frequent and thorough cleaning procedures, encouraging the use of face masks, and maintaining physical distancing in crowded spaces.","Technologies":"UV disinfection systems, electrostatic disinfection, and automated cleaning systems.","People":"Shoppers, employees, and visitors in supermarkets and crowded public indoor spaces.","Owner":"Store management, facility managers, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"The settling time of small aerosols being comparable to ventilation timescales, leading to prolonged exposure to aerosols in indoor spaces.","Impact":"Extended exposure to aerosols carrying contagious diseases, increasing the risk of infection for individuals in the space.","Mitigation":"Increasing air exchange rates, reducing occupancy levels, and implementing air disinfection technologies to minimize aerosol exposure.","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, portable air purifiers, and advanced air disinfection devices.","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces with limited ventilation and high occupancy levels.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities."}]}
